title: Dr Shabir Ally and a Unitarian Christian dialogue about Jesus
description:
Link to Podcast Episode: https://anchor.fm/transfigured-sam/episodes/Dr-Shabir-Ally-and-a-Unitarian-Christian-dialogue-about-Jesus-e19d2vf

Dr Shabir Ally is the President of the Islamic Information & Dawah Centre International in Toronto, the host of "Let the Quran Speak", and a well known Islamic Apologist. He has had many debates with Trinitarian Christians on the topic of the Trinity and is extremely well informed and articulate on the topic. Instead of a debate we have a cordial dialogue on the topic of Jesus in Unitarian Christian and Islam and what similarities and differences we have. We mention Bart Ehrman, Richard Bauckham, Rich Matt Slick, William Ellery Channing, Geoffrey Parrinder, Khalil Andani, Kenneth Cragg and many others.

Dr. Shabir's website: https://shabirally.com/

Dr. Shabir's youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/QuranSpeaks

Dr. Shabir Debates Matt Slick on the Trinity: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dDykaiFHxCw

00:00:00 - Introduction
00:04:20 - Shabir's interest in the topic of the Trinity
00:08:45 - Where did the Trinity come from
00:14:30 - Arguments for the Trinity
00:20:30 - Shabir's view on the NT's Christology
00:27:00 - The Gospel of John's Christology
00:39:40 - The Philippians Christ Hymn
00:47:00 - What do Muslims believe about Jesus?
01:06:20 - What do Muslims believe about Jesus's status now?
01:12:50 - What is the Unitarian view on the Holy Spirit?
01:20:50 - Jesus is Islamic Eschatology
01:28:20 - "Son of God" in Islam and Unitarianism
01:36:10 - Worshiping Jesus 
01:41:10 - Concluding Remarks
